suite.name: eBox OpenVPN (eBox to eBox) Test Suite
suite.desc: Contains a set of tests to ensure that ebox OpenVPN module works ok.

test.name: ConfigNetworkServer
test.desc: Sets the interface as external.

test.name: EnableModulesServer
test.desc: Enable network, firewall and openvpn modules.

test.name: RemoveGatewayServer
test.desc: Remote the default gateway on the anste's communication interface.

test.name: AddGatewayServer
test.desc: Adds the scenario router as gateway

test.name: ConfigCA
test.desc: Config CA.

test.name: ConfigNetworkClient
test.desc: Sets the interface as external.

test.name: EnableModulesClient
test.desc: Enable network, firewall and openvpn modules.

test.name: RemoveGatewayClient
test.desc: Remote the default gateway on the anste's communication interface.

test.name: AddGatewayClient
test.desc: Adds the scenario routers as gateways

test.name: SetupRouterA
test.desc: Setup redirection to eBox machine.

test.name: SetupRouterB
test.desc: Setup redirection to eBox machine.

test.name: GenerateBundle
test.desc: Generate OpenVPN bundle on eBox server.

test.name: DownloadBundle
test.desc: Download OpenVPN bundle on ebox client.

test.name: AddClientFromBundle
test.desc: Add VPN client from bundle using eBox API.

test.name: CheckClientAdded
test.desc: Check if client added and save changes. Also allow traffic from internal.

test.name: StartServer
test.desc: Start server on one of the internal clients.

test.name: TestVPNFail
test.desc: Connect to the VPN and try to access the other machine before enabling ebox to ebox connection.

test.name: AllowEboxToEbox
test.desc: Allow ebox to ebox tunnels. Also allow traffic from internal.

test.name: WaitForRoute
test.desc: Waits until the routes has been interchanged.

test.name: TestVPN
test.desc: Connect to the VPN and try to access the other machine after enabling client to client connection.

test.name: TestLogsClient
test.desc: Query the logs for the connection event.

test.name: TestLogsServer
test.desc: Query the logs for the connection event.
